data.title: What Is The Ansoff Matrix?: Growth Business Strategy Course
data.meta_description: Ansoff Matrix - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The Ansoff Matrix is a tool used by firms to analyze growth strategies and their associated risks. It outlines four growth strategies: market penetration, product development, market development, and diversification. Market penetration focuses on increasing sales of existing products to an existing market and carries the lowest risk, while diversification, which involves entering new markets with new products, is the riskiest strategy. The Ansoff Matrix was created by Igor Ansoff in 1957 and has helped businesses understand their options for expanding.
data.text: What Is The Ansoff Matrix?: Growth Business Strategy Course
